# Iteration 05 — Goal / Delivery Zone

## Goal

Allow the player to win by delivering the box to the drop zone.

At the end of this iteration:
- Player can reach the drop zone
- Win condition is detected
- Win is logged in console
- No game over screen yet

This iteration is about **win detection**, not UI.

---

## Files Allowed to Touch

- js/goal.js (new)
- js/main.js (only to import goal.js)

❌ No HTML changes  
❌ No CSS changes  
❌ No score yet  
❌ No screen switching yet
